result.ga: Tá mise go maith agus tusa
result.orig: Tá mise go maith agus tusa
result.html: Tá mise go maith agus tusaI am fine, and yourself?

result.ga: An tusa mo dhaidí

result.ga: Cailín álainn tusa

result.ga: Cé tusa
result.orig: Cé tusa
result.html: Cé tusaWho are you?
result.ponchtml: Cé tusaWho are you?

result.eng: People who speak Irish, for example you and me.
result.ga: Daoine a bhfuil Gaeilge acu mar shampla tusa agus mise
result.orig: Daoine a bhfuil Gaeilge acu mar shampla tusa agus mise

result.ponchtml: Daoine a ḃfuil Gaeilge acu mar ẛampla tusa agus misePeople who speak Irish, for example you and me.

result.eng: As for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ga: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.orig: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.html: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat achAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ponchtml: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat aċAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...

result.ga: Mise agus tusa
result.orig: Mise agus tusa
result.html: Mise agus tusaMe and you.

result.ga: Tusa Frank
result.orig: Tusa Frank
result.html: Tusa FrankAre you Frank?
result.ponchtml: Tusa FrankAre you Frank?

result.eng: The whole world knows who you are.
result.ga: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusa
result.orig: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusa
result.html: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusaThe whole world knows who you are.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios ag an saol mór cé tusaThe whole world knows who you are.

result.ga: Tá mise níos airde ná tusa

result.html: Tá mise níos airde ná tusaI am taller than you.
result.ponchtml: Tá mise níos airde ná tusaI am taller than you.

result.ga: Tá mise níos sine ná tusa
result.orig: Tá mise níos sine ná tusa
result.html: Tá mise níos sine ná tusaI am older than you.
result.ponchtml: Tá mise níos sine ná tusaI am older than you.

result.eng: I am Caitlín Ní Cheallaigh... and... who are you?
result.ga: Is mise Caitlín Ní Cheallaigh agus cé hé tusa
result.orig: Is mise Caitlín Ní Cheallaigh agus cé hé tusa

result.ga: Tá tusa go breá

result.html: Tá tusa go breáYou are fine.

result.ga: An bhfuil tusa go maith

result.html: An bhfuil tusa go maithAre you (yourself) well?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tusa go maiṫAre you (yourself) well?

result.eng: I am from Indreabhán. Where do you live?
result.ga: Is as Indreabhán mé Cá bhfuil tusa i do chónaí
result.orig: Is as Indreabhán mé Cá bhfuil tusa i do chónaí
result.html: Is as Indreabhán mé Cá bhfuil tusa i do chónaíI am from Indreabhán. Where do you live?
result.ponchtml: Is as Indreaḃán mé Cá ḃfuil tusa i do ċónaíI am from Indreabhán. Where do you live?

result.ga: An imríonn tusa leadóg a Antonio
result.orig: An imríonn tusa leadóg a Antonio
result.html: An imríonn tusa leadóg a AntonioDo you play tennis, Antonio?
result.ponchtml: An imríonn tusa leadóg a AntonioDo you play tennis, Antonio?

result.ga: An tusa an leabharlannaí
result.orig: An tusa an leabharlannaí
result.html: An tusa an leabharlannaíAre you the librarian?
result.ponchtml: An tusa an leaḃarlannaíAre you the librarian?

result.eng: And yourself, what will you drink?
result.ga: Agus tú féin céard a ólfaidh tusa
result.orig: Agus tú féin céard a ólfaidh tusa
result.html: Agus tú féin céard a ólfaidh tusaAnd yourself, what will you drink?
result.ponchtml: Agus tú féin céard a ólfaiḋ tusaAnd yourself, what will you drink?

result.eng: Do you live in Galway city?
result.ga: An bhfuil tusa i do chónaí i gcathair na Gaillimhe
result.orig: An bhfuil tusa i do chónaí i gcathair na Gaillimhe
result.html: An bhfuil tusa i do chónaí i gcathair na GaillimheDo you live in Galway city?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tusa i do ċónaí i gcaṫair na GailliṁeDo you live in Galway city?

result.eng: Which of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó SiobhánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sine tusa nó SioḃánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?

result.ga: Agus an tusa an duine is sine
result.orig: Agus an tusa an duine is sine
result.html: Agus an tusa an duine is sineAnd are you the oldest?
result.ponchtml: Agus an tusa an duine is sineAnd are you the oldest?

result.ga: Cá bhfuil tusa i do chónaí a Alan
result.orig: Cá bhfuil tusa i do chónaí a Alan
result.html: Cá bhfuil tusa i do chónaí a AlanWhere do you live, Alan?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil tusa i do ċónaí a AlanWhere do you live, Alan?

result.eng: Where are you living now, Caitríona?
result.ga: Cá bhfuil tusa i do chónaí anois a Chaitríona
result.orig: Cá bhfuil tusa i do chónaí anois a Chaitríona
result.html: Cá bhfuil tusa i do chónaí anois a ChaitríonaWhere are you living now, Caitríona?

result.ga: An bhfuil tusa pósta
result.orig: An bhfuil tusa pósta
result.html: An bhfuil tusa póstaAre you married?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tusa póstaAre you married?

result.eng: Are you still sharing an apartment with Laura?

result.orig: An bhfuil tusa fós ag roinnt árasáin le Laura
result.html: An bhfuil tusa fós ag roinnt árasáin le LauraAre you still sharing an apartment with Laura?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tusa fós ag roinnt árasáin le LauraAre you still sharing an apartment with Laura?

result.eng: We are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.
result.ga: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus mise
result.orig: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus mise
result.html: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus miseWe are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.
result.ponchtml: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nascṫa tusa agus miseWe are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.

result.eng: Who are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]
result.ga: Cé tusa domsa
result.orig: Cé tusa domsa
result.html: Cé tusa domsaWho are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]
result.ponchtml: Cé tusa domsaWho are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]

result.eng: You will get something you didn't bargain for!
result.ga: Gheobhaidh tusa rud nach dearn tú margadh air
result.orig: Gheobhaidh tusa rud nach dearn tú margadh air
result.html: Gheobhaidh tusa rud nach dearn tú margadh airYou will get something you didn't bargain for!
result.ponchtml: Ġeoḃaiḋ tusa rud naċ dearn tú margaḋ airYou will get something you didn't bargain for!

result.ga: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féin
result.orig: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féin
result.html: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féinYou're just like him!
result.ponchtml: Tá tusa inċurṫa leis féinYou're just like him!
